post.content:
Job Fair - SAP Positions Available

D&L ERP Inc. is a leading global consulting and IT services company,
offering a wide array of solutions customized for a range of key SAP Soulutions

Job Opportunities for Experienced/Certified/New Graduates in

  SAP - BW     SAP - MM    SAP - SD    SAP- Basis        
  SAP - FI/CO  SAP - HR    SAP – ABAP  SAP – EP

Seminar On  :  November 28, 2006 @ 6 PM

Please bring your resume with you

(905) 944-1222 or (416) 833-8441

homepage : www.dnlerp.ca

NEW Head Office:  3100 Steeles Ave East, Suite 903, MARKHAM ON.  

Tel: 905-9440-211 or 416-833-8441    

Contact person: Lisa or Sonya
post.title: Job Fair - SAP Positions Available
